channel.title: Ethics on Steven Deobald
channel.description: Recent content in Ethics on Steven Deobald

item.title: Ethical Software For Everyone
item.description: Can I interest you in a nutrition label? Ethics! We all have a few. Every day, my personal ethics evolve in varying degrees. It seemed harmless to speak loudly and abrasively in my early twenties — a speech full of arbitrary and contrary words. Who was I hurting? Now I know. The increments of personal ethics evolution are slow and sometimes the work takes decades. Crossing the bridge of intoxicants, for example.
